snippet: With some modification, a high-ceilinged one-bedroom apartment meets everyone’s needs.
abstract: Yaron Schwartzman and Alexandra Polier create upstairs sleeping area for their son in loft-like Greenwich Village apartment after failing to find suitable two-bedroom.
lead_paragraph: With some modification, a high-ceilinged one-bedroom apartment meets everyone’s needs.

headline.print_headline: A Loft, Divided, for a Family of Four
headline.main: A Greenwich Village Loft for a Family of Four
